mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_walk (lat, lng, place) VALUES (#{lat}, #{lng}, #{place})
mapper.select: SELECT place, ( 6371 * acos ( cos ( RADIANS(#{lat}) ) * cos( RADIANS(lat)) * cos( RADIANS((lng)) - RADIANS(#{lng}) ) + sin ( RADIANS(#{lat}) ) * sin( RADIANS(lat)) ) ) AS distance ,lat,lng FROM tbl_walk HAVING distance < #{range} ORDER BY distance
